scan_crops_server.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #! /usr/bin/python2
2 import rospy
3 import actionlib
4 from sensor_msgs.msg import PointCloud2
5 from sensor_msgs import point_cloud2
6 
7 from ros_crop_estimation.msg import ScanCropsAction, ScanCropsResult
8 from topological_navigation.msg import GotoNodeAction, GotoNodeGoal
9 
10 
11 class ScanCropLinesServer:
12  """
13  A server to manage crop line scanning actions.
14  It automatically navigates to the specified waypoints and returns the count of grape-bunches.
15  """
16 
17  def __init__(self):
18  rospy.init_node('scan_cropline_server')
19  self.client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient(
20  '/thorvald_001/topological_navigation', GotoNodeAction)
21  self.client.wait_for_server()
22 
23  # first start server to prevent race condition
24  self.server = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(
25  'scan_crops', ScanCropsAction, self.execute, False)
26  self.server.start()
27  self.scaned_crop_lines = 0
28  self.scanned_bunches = 0
29 
30  def execute(self, scan_crop_goal):
31  # Do lots of robot stuff here
32  self.client.wait_for_server()
33 
34  # send first goal
35  goal = GotoNodeGoal()
36  goal.target = scan_crop_goal.crop_waypoint
37  self.client.send_goal(goal)
38  # wait until the action is complete
39  status = self.client.wait_for_result(rospy.Duration(120))
40  result = self.client.get_result()
41  rospy.loginfo("status is %s", status)
42  rospy.loginfo("result is %s", result)
43 
44  rospy.loginfo("Waiting for global object map to check crop estimate")
45  pc_global_obj = rospy.wait_for_message(
46  "/object_detector/global_map", PointCloud2)
47  object_points = point_cloud2.read_points(pc_global_obj)
48  self.scanned_bunches = len(list(object_points))
49  self.scaned_crop_lines += 1
50  ret_result = ScanCropsResult()
51  ret_result.crop_estimated = self.scanned_bunches
52  self.server.set_succeeded(ret_result)
53 
54 
55 if __name__ == '__main__':
56  server = ScanCropLinesServer()
57  rospy.spin()
